about.title: About Maskan
about.subtitle: Connecting Egypt, One Home at a Time
about.ourStoryText: Maskan was created with a simple goal: to make it easier for people across Egypt to find comfortable and trustworthy places to stay. Inspired by the concept of community and hospitality, we built a platform that brings together hosts and guests in a safe, transparent, and convenient way.

whatWeDoList.item1: Connect travelers and locals with unique stays across Egypt.
whatWeDoList.item2: Provide hosts with tools to manage listings, bookings, and payments easily.
whatWeDoList.item3: Ensure every booking is backed by secure transactions and clear communication.

whyChooseList.item1: We know Egypt and its neighborhoods inside out.
whyChooseList.item2: Every property is reviewed for safety and accuracy.
whyChooseList.item3: Your transactions are protected from start to finish.

about.visionText: We aim to be Egypt’s most trusted platform for local travel and stays — a place where people feel at home wherever they go. Our mission is to strengthen communities, support local hosts, and help travelers experience the authentic side of Egypt.
about.contactText: Have questions, feedback, or ideas? We’d love to hear from you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Maskan — your trusted local platform for finding and booking apartments in Egypt. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

info.title: Information We Collect
info.item1: Personal details such as name, phone number, email address, and payment information.
info.item2: Booking and listing details including dates, locations, and property preferences.
info.item3: Technical data like IP address, browser type, and device information.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.item1: To process bookings and manage listings.
usage.item2: To improve our services and user experience.
usage.item3: To communicate important updates and offers.
usage.item4: To ensure platform security and prevent fraud.

sharing.title: Sharing of Information
sharing.text: We only share your information with hosts, guests, and service providers when necessary to complete bookings, comply with the law, or improve our services. We never sell your personal data.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We use secure technologies and follow industry standards to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Access and update your personal information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us.
